entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Burlington
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:10 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burlington Lift Bridge 1:00 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -3.4°C
Wind: ENE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 1.

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of freezing rain. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
